NEW - Twitter's new @Birdwatch, a "community-driven approach to addressing misleading information," detailed in a video. Looks like we're in for coordinated, major Mob Wars on Twitter soon.

Twitter announced today they'd be introducing #Birdwatch, labels it a community-based approach to "fighting misinformation" i.e. similar approach Facebook took with outsourcing censorship decisions to external "fact-checkers."
